احبتي في الله لن تكتشف انك تمتلك ثروة الصحة إلا عندما تنام على سرير المرض. ولن تكتشف انك تمتلك ثروة الدفئ الإنساني إلا عندما تفتقد أحبتك.
ربي هناك مرضى فوق أسرةٍ بيضاء لانور ولا سماء   يتمنون الشفاء فإشفْهم يا رب أنت الشافي المعافي لاشفاء إلا شفاءك يارب...

💠في #رمضان نعمل على: 

شراء ادوية، شراء معدات، مساعدة ذوي المرضى وشراء كسوة العيد للاطفال بمدينة #عدن

فمن لدية المقدرة فليتواصل معنا🙏
يجب أن يعرف الناس أن #الاطفال المرضى #بالسرطان ليسو محكومين عليهم بالموت فالله موجود والأمل موجود أيضاً.

أسأل الله العظيم رب العرش الكريم أن لا يحرمنا وإياكم من خمسة : 

رزقه وطاعته، ورحمته ومغفرته، وجنة الفردوس الاعلى .

اكثر الأشياء الماً في رمضان لهذا العام ان هناك اطفال ونساء وشيوخ #بعدن فتكت بهم الامراض والجوع والقصف المستمر عليهم،

No matter what field you are from, you can always chose to be a good human being. Humanity always comes first.
If you have the opportunity to do something awesome for someone else, even if it doesn't benefit you in any way, do it.
مثلما يصيب السرطان جسم الإنسان فإنه يصيب ضميره أيضا الفرق أن سرطان الجسم يقتل المصاب به أما سرطان الضمير فيقتل الآخرين.
In our daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy.
A human being is not to be handled as a tool but is to be respected and revered.
The reward of a thing well done is to have done it.
Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.

Faith is why I'm here today and faith is why I made it through.

Only God can take our failures and turn them into victories.
Seeing people change isn’t what hurts. What hurts is remembering who they used to be.

Being lonely is like a storm with no rain, crying without tears.

Being Ignored.
Worst feeling ever. http://t.co/oO3Q6z1lUL
When you are depressed, life is too long.
I don’t know if I’m waiting for you to love me, or if I’m waiting for you to realize what you lost.
Sometimes it’s better to be Alone…Nobody can hurt you.
I smile not for that I am happy, but sometimes I smile to hide sadness. http://t.co/K1sLHIAwe5
Ignore me. I don’t care. I’m used to it anyways. I’m invisible. http://t.co/2ZFXHVTP9p
I’m not okay, I’m just good at pretending I am. http://t.co/Zdzkl9anJG
Sometimes, crying is the only way your eyes speak when your mouth can’t explain how broken your heart is.
The heart reeks of sadness and pain, the face exposes the fake happiness that never actually was pride.
Sometimes you weren't supposed to share pain. Sometimes it was best just to deal with it alone.
If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
There you go...let it all slide out. Unhappiness can't stick in a person's soul when it's slick with tears.
When you've suffered a great deal in life, each additional pain is both unbearable and trifling.
Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it 24 hours a day.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
